original_title: Concert YY 黃偉文作品展
overview: One of the top wordsmiths in Canto-pop, Wyman Wong made pop history in February 2012 with a series of six sold-out concerts at the Hong Kong Coliseum to celebrate and showcase his illustrious career of 18 years and counting. These star-studded concerts featured Wyman's best works, chosen from his extensive repertoire by the man himself, and performed by over 40 guest singers - from the hottest stars to the very rare appearances like Amanda Lee, Shine, and Cass Phang - who showed up in designer costumes under the fashion-savvy lyricist's direction. Now you can relive such a sumptuous feast for the senses that is Concert YY on this 3-Blu-ray set, complete with 88 songs and a total running time of over six hours!
title: Concert YY - Showcase Of Wyman Wong
